mapper.select: SELECT ledger_id, member_id, trans_date, ( CASE trans_type WHEN '0000' THEN '기타' WHEN '0001' THEN '식비' WHEN '0002' THEN '문화생활' WHEN '0003' THEN '교통비' WHEN '0004' THEN '통신비' WHEN '0005' THEN '카드' WHEN '0006' THEN '저축/투자' WHEN '0007' THEN '교육' END ) AS trans_type, trans_amount, trans_comment FROM ledger WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND TO_CHAR(trans_date, 'YYYYMM') = #{searchDate} ORDER BY trans_date desc LIMIT #{currentPage}, 10
